definition: the road one must follow or take/the only way
to follow/from/it is for...to/reason/cause/because of/due to/to/to leave it (to sb)/by (introduces passive verb)

sentences.english: Adhering technical innovation and popularization of science is the only way to make enterprise powerful.
sentences.chinese: 坚持科技创新和科学普及是企业发展壮大的必由之路。

sentences.english: To amplify law system can solve the safety problems in production basically.
sentences.chinese: 健全法制是从根本上解决安全生产问题的必由之路。

sentences.english: Adhering to the Mass Line is the only way to implement Anthropocentrism thoroughly .
sentences.chinese: 坚持走群众路线是全面贯彻落实以人为本的必由之路。

sentences.english: Industry-university cooperation is the necessary choice for the development of higher vocational education.
sentences.chinese: 产学合作是高职教育改革和发展的必由之路。

sentences.english: Trade liberalization was put forward as a sure route to prosperity for developing countries.
sentences.chinese: 贸易自由化被视为发展中国家致富的必由之路。

sentences.english: To hold the distinguishing feature and make the sustainable development is the certain way for Anji to develop its bamboo tourism.
sentences.chinese: 抓住特色，持续发展是安吉竹旅游发展的必由之路。

sentences.english: Learning how to create happiness on your own is a key part of building self-confidence.
sentences.chinese: 学习怎样给自己带来快乐是建立自信心的必由之路。

sentences.english: Literature" expression is the only way of sublimation of Chinese folk art."
sentences.chinese: “文学化过程”是民间艺术样式提升层次的必由之路。

sentences.english: It is the only way for the sustainable development of private hospitals to implement its credit system.
sentences.chinese: 完善民营医院信用体系是其可持续发展的必由之路。

sentences.english: The pursuit of openness and inclusiveness is the only way leading a country or a nation to strength and prosperity.
sentences.chinese: 开放兼容是一个国家和民族走向繁荣富强的必由之路。

sentences.english: Industrialization is the only way of settling down the problem of townie garbage problem.
sentences.chinese: 产业化是解决城市生活垃圾问题的必由之路。

sentences.english: To build intensive urban and conservation-oriented society is the only way for urbanization in China.
sentences.chinese: 集约型城市和节约型社会是中国城镇化的必由之路。

sentences.english: After rigorous training is the only way to self-perfection.
sentences.chinese: 历经严酷的训练是完善自我的必由之路。

sentences.english: It is reasonable trend of economy development from traditional procurement way to moderne-procurement.
sentences.chinese: 政府电子化是政府采购制度发展的必由之路。

sentences.english: Thirdly, cooperative road is the only road for China's rural development.
sentences.chinese: 合作化道路是中国农村发展的必由之路。

sentences.english: Administer college by law is the only way for management of college students.
sentences.chinese: “依法治校”是高校学生管理的必由之路。

definition: the road one must follow or take/the only way/same as 必由之路[bi4 you2 zhi1 lu4]
to stride toward (success)/to march toward/to take a step toward
the one and only way/the only proper course to take
of the utmost importance/of highest priority
to push (for acceptance of a plan)/to push forward/to promote/to actuate/CL:個|个[ge4]
a heavy load and a long road/fig. to bear heavy responsibilities through a long struggle (cf Confucian Analects, 8.7)
